anime.description: 8-year-old Wu Xiao Song claims to be the descendant of Wu Song. One day, he arrives in Jing Yang Gang where legend has it that Wu Song once beat a tiger. Xiao Song, who looks so brave and understands the language of animals, plans to take revenge against the tiger which ate his 7-year-old cousin the day before. Can he make it?

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: CAST MISSING
tag.description: Important characters are missing, either in-part or entirely. This includes basic entry info (name, gender, picture), appear episode range, seiyuu and/or tags.
